import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal" function ProjectForm({ project, users, postProject, edit, editProject, projectId, setProjectId, errors, show, setShow }) { const initialState = { projectName: undefined, description: undefined, startDate: undefined, targetEndDate: undefined, assignedUser: undefined, } const [state, setState] = useState(initialState) const handleClose = () => { setShow(false); setState(initialState) setProjectId("") } useEffect(() => { if (edit && project) setState({ ...project }) }, [project, setProjectId]) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() switch (e.target.name) { case "create": postProject(state) break case "edit": editProject(projectId, state) break default: return } } const userOptions = users.map((user, i) => ( )) const handleChange = (e) => { setState({ ...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (
{edit ? "Edit Project" : "Create Project"}
{errors.message &&
{errors.message}
} {edit ? <> : <> }
) } export default withRouter(ProjectForm)
